page.title: 05 Dairyherd,Bridgefarm
page.content:
The dairyherd at Bridgefarm,Addington, consists of 200 Friesian cows which are kept ffor milking. The milking parlour is a herring bone design,16 cows can be machine milked at a time. The milk goes into tanks which hold 400gallons,here the milk is cooled,a paddle stirs it round the whole time.There are 3 of these tanks.The milk is collected daily by the tanker.
Approximate Yield.
1 cow ---------- 32 litres per day Herd of 200 cows-6400 l. per day Herd of 200 cows-2336000l.per year
